name: What's important?
description:
Low Effort Jam 8 theme was: Water. Game made in about 14h. All assets and code was made by me.

Instead of doing ships floating on water or a game about diving (like I wanted at the beginning), I wanted to do a very simple game about something else - the journey.

You live in a village in the desert. One day the village ran out of water. They asked you to go and find some. Somebody told you that in the ruins nearby could be water. You decide to go there.

A, D - horizonal movement
W - jump
